about.title: About SIFS Theory
about.subtitle: Scale-Invariant Fractal Spacetime â€” Unification of physics through fractal geometry
about.description_body: â€” is a unified geometric field theory that combines gravity, quantum mechanics, and cosmology through the fractal geometry of 5-dimensional spacetime. The theory solves fundamental problems of modern physics: mass hierarchy, the nature of dark energy, proton stability, and the black hole information paradox.
about.main_idea_text1: Our 4D universe is a 3-brane in a 5-dimensional fractal bulk spacetime (Randall-Sundrum model). The fifth coordinate S represents physical scale â€” not an abstract parameter, but a real geometric coordinate.
about.main_idea_text2: The scale coordinate covers the entire range from the Planck scale (10â»Â³âµ m) to the Hubble scale (10Â²â¶ m), creating a fractal self-similar structure of spacetime. Exponential warping of the metric exp(âˆ’k|S|) naturally explains why gravity is 10Â³â¸ times weaker than the strong interaction.
about.calculations_text1: All fundamental constants (G, Î±, Î±_s, G_F) are derived from a single geometric axiom without free parameters. Proton mass emerges automatically as a scale-suppressed Planck mass. Dark energy is explained by the drift of the global scale coordinate.
about.calculations_text2: The theory makes 27 testable predictions, 11 of which have already been confirmed by observational data (DESI 2025, Euclid, JWST, EHT). A key achievement is the explanation of evolving dark energy with a >4Ïƒ deviation from the standard Î›CDM model, which is consistent with SIFS predictions about scale coordinate drift.

unification.title: Unification
unification.text: A unified geometric basis for all interactions. Gravity, electromagnetism, strong, and weak interactions are all gradients of the vacuum refractive index at different scales.

predictions.title: Predictions
predictions.text: 27 testable predictions with specific numerical values. Predictions for colliders (LHC, FCC), gravitational waves (LIGO, Virgo), cosmology (CMB, structure formation).

confirmations.title: Confirmations
confirmations.text: DESI 2025: evolving dark energy (>4Ïƒ). Euclid/JWST: early massive structures. EHT: polarization flips in M87*. All consistent with the theory without fine-tuning.

achievements_list.mass_hierarchy: Mass Hierarchy: Explanation from Planck scale (10â»Â³âµ m) to Hubble scale (10Â²â¶ m) from a single geometric axiom. Proton mass emerges automatically as scale-suppressed Planck mass without introducing it as a parameter.
achievements_list.constants: 8 fundamental constants derived: Gravitational constant G, fine structure constant Î±, strong coupling constant Î±_s, Fermi constant G_F, cosmological constant Î›, and others â€” all from one geometry without free parameters.
achievements_list.desi: DESI 2025: Evolving dark energy with >4Ïƒ deviation from standard Î›CDM model fully consistent with SIFS predictions about global scale coordinate drift. This is not a coincidence, but a consequence of geometry.
achievements_list.predictions_count: 27 testable predictions: 11 already confirmed by observational data (DESI, Euclid, JWST, EHT), 4 in verification process, 12 awaiting experimental verification at colliders and gravitational wave detectors.
achievements_list.paradoxes: Paradox Resolution: Black hole information paradox solved via ER=EPR correspondence. Proton stability explained by quantum entanglement and frozen time at the effective horizon.

abstract.title: Scale-Invariant Fractal Spacetime
abstract.subtitle: SIFS Theory â€” Unification of Quantum Mechanics, Gravity and Cosmology

intro.body: represents a unified geometric field theory that solves fundamental problems of modern physics by introducing a scale coordinate as a real geometric dimension. The theory unifies gravity, quantum mechanics, and cosmology into a single mathematical structure without free parameters.

main.title: ðŸŒŒ Main Concept
main.text: SIFS postulates that our 4D universe is a 3-brane in a 5-dimensional fractal bulk spacetime (Randall-Sundrum type II model), where the fifth coordinate S represents physical scale â€” not an abstract parameter, but a real geometric dimension.
main.subtext: The metric has the form: dsÂ² = exp(âˆ’2k|S|) Î·_Î¼Î½ dx^Î¼ dx^Î½ + dSÂ², where exponential warping naturally explains the mass hierarchy between the Planck and electroweak scales. The scale coordinate covers the entire range from 10â»Â³âµ m (Planck) to 10Â²â¶ m (Hubble), creating a fractal self-similar structure.

particles.title: âš›ï¸ Elementary Particles
particles.text: Protons and electrons are considered as micro-singularities (Kerr-Newman black holes) with effective horizons in the 5D bulk, where mass is suppressed by the RS-warping mechanism: m_obs = M_bulk Ã— exp(âˆ’k|S|).
particles.subtext: For the proton: true mass in bulk M_bulk â‰ˆ 10Â¹â´ g, but observed mass m_p = 1.67Ã—10â»Â²â´ g due to suppression by 14 orders of magnitude. Stability is ensured by frozen time at the horizon and the topological invariant of charge. Hawking radiation is exponentially suppressed: Ï„ âˆ exp(2k|S|).

unification.title: ðŸ”— Unification of Interactions
unification.text: Gravity and quantum effects are manifestations of warped RS2 geometry + fractal self-similarity. Gordon's optical metric makes all interactions gradients of the vacuum refractive index: F = âˆ’âˆ‡n(r, S).
unification.subtext: All fundamental forces (gravity, electromagnetism, strong, weak) arise as gradients dn/dr at different values of the scale coordinate |S|. Gravity is weak because |S_grav| â‰ˆ 20, and the strong interaction is strong because |S_QCD| â‰ˆ 2.8. This is a geometric consequence, not a coincidence.

ouroboros.title: â™¾ï¸ Ouroboros Principle
ouroboros.text: Infinite hierarchy of scales: micro â†” macro. Fractal self-similarity connects the quantum world with cosmological structures through log-periodic oscillations: f(S) = fâ‚€ Ã— [1 + A cos(Ï‰ ln|S| + Ï†)].
ouroboros.subtext: The structure of matter demonstrates self-similarity: quarks â†’ nucleons â†’ atoms â†’ planets â†’ galaxies. Time scales in astrophysical phenomena (accretion, jets, polarization flips) also show log-periodicity, which is confirmed by Event Horizon Telescope observations for M87*.

insight.text: Each "particle" is not a point, but a singularity in the 5D bulk, extended along the S coordinate. What we observe as mass and charge is a 4D projection of deep 5D geometry. Scale is not an abstraction, but a physical dimension.

schwarzschild.interpretation: 39 orders of magnitude smaller than observed radius
schwarzschild.details: This is the classical Schwarzschild radius for the proton mass. It shows that if the proton were a regular black hole, its horizon would be incredibly small.

planck.title: Planck Mass at r_p
planck.details: Planck mass scaled to proton size almost exactly matches its observed mass. This is a key observation of SIFS theory.

warping.title: RS-warping Factor

horizon.title: Effective Horizon in 5D
horizon.details: In 5D bulk space, the effective horizon is much larger, but it is not observed in 4D due to the warping factor.

result.title: Unification Result
result.text: Proton mass does NOT need to be introduced as a parameter. It appears automatically as scale-suppressed Planck mass at distance r_p: m_p = M_Pl Ã— exp(âˆ’k|S_p|)
result.subtext: Stability: Charge â€” topological invariant of brane (conserved). Mass â€” projection in 4D (suppressed). Energy can leak into bulk (evaporation distributed over S).

main_concept.title: Fractal Extension of AdS/CFT
main_concept.text: SIFS is a fractal extension of the holographic AdS/CFT correspondence principle: our 4D brane is dual to gravity in warped fractal AdSâ‚… bulk spacetime. This means all information about quantum field theory on the brane is encoded in gravitational dynamics in the 5D bulk.
main_concept.subtext: Key difference from standard AdS/CFT: the scale coordinate S creates a fractal structure, leading to log-periodic oscillations in entanglement entropy and modulations in holographic entropy. This explains observed time scales in astrophysical phenomena.

entropy.title: Entropy
entropy.text: Bekenstein-Hawking entropy S_BH = A/(4G) is the source of brane tension in the 5D bulk. This tension creates an effective cosmological constant via entropic pressure: Î›_eff âˆ (S_horizon / Area) Ã— exp(âˆ’2k|S_global|).
entropy.subtext: Entropy scales with horizon area but is suppressed by the warping factor, explaining the smallness of the cosmological constant and its evolution over time (evolving dark energy).

oscillations.title: Oscillations
oscillations.text: Log-periodic oscillations of the scale coordinate S create modulations in entanglement entropy. This manifests as polarization flips in black hole accretion disks and time scales of astrophysical phenomena.
oscillations.subtext: Formula: S_ent(S) = Sâ‚€ Ã— [1 + A cos(Ï‰ ln|S| + Ï†)], where amplitude A and frequency Ï‰ are determined by the fractal structure of spacetime.

duality.title: Duality
duality.text: Gravity in the 5D bulk is fully equivalent to quantum field theory on the 4D brane via holographic correspondence. This means gravitational effects in the bulk (e.g., Hawking radiation) correspond to quantum processes on the brane (e.g., particle decay).
duality.subtext: The black hole information paradox is solved via ER=EPR correspondence: entangled particles are connected by Einstein-Rosen bridges in the bulk, preserving the unitarity of quantum mechanics.

confirmation.title: Confirmation: EHT 2025
